q: Colin Powell thinks that America "isn't quite post-racial" at this time. "These problems still exist in post-racial America." With rumors swirling around Westminster earlier this week that Mr. Andy Coulson had already offered to resign, the prime minister publicly expressed full confidence in his aide. Obviously, when he was editor of the News of the World bad things happened at the newspaper, and when he found out about those things he resigned, and that was the right thing to do, Mr. David Cameron told BBC radio's Today program.
